Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ipi.GeometricObject
      • ipi.Triangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GeometricObject>

    public class Triangle
extends GeometricObject
    Child of GeometricObject, has 3 sides.
